full_summary:
=================
### Wide Ductless Fume Hoods Tender

#### Solicitation Information
- **Tender Reference Number** : WS3731287027
- **Amendment Number** : 2
- **Publication Date** : December 19, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date** : February 2, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
- **Amendment Date** : January 25, 2023

#### Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) have a requirement for the supply, delivery, and installation of ductless fume hood cabinets to multiple locations in Alberta, Canada. The estimated duration of the project is three years.

The project relates to the UNSPSC category *Laboratory enclosures and accessories* (41103500). The procurement is a Request for Standing Offer (RfSO) using the *Competitive* method.

#### Selection Criteria
The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price offered by the bidder.

#### Bidder Requirements
All bidder should submit their bid and supporting documentation as per the protocol stated in the Ariba Discovery Publication. Bids submitted after the closing time (February 2, 2023, 2:00 PM EST) will be considered non-responsive.

#### Regional Opportunities
The contract covers the following regions:
- Coronation
- Barrhead
- Ponoka
- Tofield
- Vermilion
- Drumheller
- Westlock
- Morinville
- Coaldale
- Hinton
- Provost

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is eligible for the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Contact Information
For further information, please contact Roxanne Kunz (SPAC/PSPC) by sending an email to roxanne.kunz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Important Notice
The contract will be awarded when the evaluation process is complete, and the bidder passes the bid submission requirements. The exact date for the contract award will be communicated to the winning bidder.

### Go To:
To access the full solicitation information, please click on the notice URL below:
- http://discovery.ariba
